alert.note: Alert for Clark; Nye (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 11 at 4:23PM PDT until August 11 at 7:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... East Central Nye County in south central Nevada... Northwestern Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 730 PM PDT. * At 423 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across far northwest Clark and southern Nye Counties. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of East Central Nye and Northwestern Clark Counties FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
